about_the_game:
Go inside a 4 story mech and fight for ideals you dont understand!

go into the world beyond the apocalypse, and become a Synthetic! a new creation that blurs the line between machine and nature! these Synthetics pilot Warhammers. giving them immense power over the battlefield.
But theres notions of a ghost haunting the most powerful warhammers. taking the strange power inside the machine and pilot!


In this Vr mech bullethell, you can customize your mech. replace your arms, legs, chest, head or boosters!

you can attach smoke grenades to your arm, missle-launchers on your knees, you can even have a gun for a head!
conquer the battle-field as a truly full armored mech! impossible arsenals are now found possible with the infinite customization of your own cockpit!
wait... if you have all this weaponry attached, wheres the ammo gonna go?


use your kitted-out mech against vicious enemys! these arn't other ai that run at you or hide behind cover, they will rip you limb from limb if you don't get moving!
just because those pilots dont have any life, doesn't mean they wont to take yours!

content_descriptors.notes: the mechas blow each other apart while spitting poetry. and all of them are non-binary because everyone is a robot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: VR device required

short_description: Put on your VR headset, get inside the warhammer, go into the post-post apopcolyptic world of Synthetic. fight challenging VR enemy's with an attachment of a wide arsenal of weaponry, from shoulder missle launchers to arm gatling guns!
